name: Dress Up
description:
DOWNLOAD FREE for a limited time!!!
Design your own SWEET SUITE and customize your model in this addicting dress up game! Be one of the first to own this amazing app! Download now to get tons of free items…everything from disco lights to fuzzy kittens to luxury decor. And cute NEW Boyfriends!

Start with your model, where can you can create your avatar with skin tones, hairstyles, eye color, eyebrows, lips, and eyeliner and mascara.

Then move into your dreamy bedroom, gorgeous living room and cool kitchen, where you get to choose from trendy paint colors and wallpaper, and decorate with windows, curtains, lamps, beds, sofas, cushions, tables, dressing tables, flowers, artwork, clocks, candles, food (yes, even pizza and sushi), gaming and electronics (cool guitars and stereos), and MUCH MUCH MUCH MUCH more.

Once your rooms are decorated, head over to your dressing room and pick today's outfit from cute tops, pants, shoes earrings necklaces and glasses.

Head back over to your rooms and save some awesome scenes to share with friends!

Download and play Today for FREE!

Current collections include FREE:

Paint colors, wallpapers
Windows, curtains, rods
Lamps, floor lamps, ceiling lamps, holiday lights
Artwork, frames, posters
Beds, sofas, furniture
Clocks, neon
Flowers, vases, potted plants, trees
Candles, candleholders
Food, drinks, desserts
Electronics, guitars, stereos, microphones, speakers, laptops
Kitchen cabinets
Appliances
Luxury decor, artwork, vases
Clothes, shirts, pants, shoes
FREE Item of the Day
MUCH MUCH MORE!
